CustomFieldTranslation.help: The maximum number of related Opportunities on an Account or Contact allowed in non-Skew Mode Rollup Batch Jobs. An Account or Contact with more than this number of related Opportunities will always be rolled up using Skew Mode.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Skew Mode Threshold
CustomFieldTranslation.name: Rollups_Limit_on_Attached_Opps_for_Skew__c
